website_summaries.verdict: You can set up this water filter in minutes, and have clean, odorless water for years to come.
pros: Removes sediments, chlorine and bad odors in a three-stage filtration system
Filters last over a year at a time
Faucet included, but you can also attach to your own
cons: This filter is large and may be more money than some people are willing to pay

customer_reviews.title: Wow... best water ever!
customer_reviews.text: We have a well and typical well hard water with a very unpleasant taste. I installed the WFS-1000 under our coffee-bar sink to provide filtered drinking water and clean tasting water for tea and our espresso maker. What a difference! Great clean taste with the double carbon filters. The WFS-1000 is super easy to install. Since I wanted to filter all the cold water coming out of our faucet, I replaced the provided push-to-connect fittings with 3/8 OD Tube compression x 1/4 MIP brass fitting which allowed me to connect right to standard supply lines. Flow rate is great - as is the water!
customer_reviews.author: Craig L.

customer_reviews.title: Our water tastes better than it did before
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a piece of cake. READ THE DIRECTIONS FIRST!!! More than enough tubing material for install. The adapter is slick which makes installation even easier (see pictures). If you have never installed a faucet before don't hire someone...YOU CAN DO THIS!! Our water tastes better than it did before. Customer service helped with ordering replacement filters. I prefer not having the same two filters in stages 2 and 3. There are six different filters you can use in stage 3- FI-CHLORAMINE , FI-FLOURIDE ,FI-CERAMI, FI-PHPLUS, FI-NITRATE and FI-ARSENIC Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: J05hh

customer_reviews.title: No more pool smell.
customer_reviews.text: Our county water started smelling more like a pool than potable water so we were concerned drinking from the tap. We purchased a Brita filter and it helped somewhat but still it pleasant to drink. I researched the under counter water filters and decided against a RO system due to the water waste and purchased this unit. Install was easy in under and hour and water is fantastic, no more pool water. Hoping the filters last the year as specified but if not still very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Theplasterman

customer_reviews.title: Good construction. Water taste great.
customer_reviews.text: I have been very impressed with this product. I've owned several under-sink filter systems before. This one is definitely more superior. The water taste is good. And, best of all, the water pressure is superb! In comparison to the large box store brands that I've bought in the past, this one definitely has better water pressure. As for the construction - The parts are definitely better than what you get from the box store brands. The faucet is stainless steel construction and not the plastic stuff you usually get with other brands. Overall I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: B Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This APEC WFS-1000 was very easy to install. It replaced my previous Reverse Osmosis Filtration System. ROFS requires a water pressure above 40 PSI in order to work properly. I had this info late and it was draining water almost 24/7. I use water well and normal pressure for my system is 30/50; it means, when pressure was less then 40 the auto valve was open for draining. A waste. I installed this APEC WFS-1000 longer then a month and water doesn't taste as good as the one from reverse-osmosis but is better then plain. I’ll be using all three carbon filters to improve quality since I have a sediment one for the whole house.
customer_reviews.author: G. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't filter much of anything. Really.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes the same. TDS is the same. Total waste of time and money. My tap water is 65-66 TDS and this filter is exactly the same. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: pdxgymrat

customer_reviews.title: BUY A GOOD WATER TESTER!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work! It’s doesn’t actually filter the water. We have really hard water. Installation pretty straight forward, water out of the tap 748 ppm. Water from this RO? 738 ppm!! Sam’s Club bottled water? 25ppm!! It’s going back.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa FFC

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy Water after Install
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this filter given rating. However, after install, which was mostly easy enough, the water comes out cloudy. And, yes, this is after flushing the system for nearly 25 mins and running through 10-15 gallons of water after installation. My unfiltered tap water looks crystal clear compared to APEC filtered water. Something is not right with the filter system. I kept hoping it would clear up and go away but it's not getting any better, still comes out cloudy with sediment particles. I don't have all days to hope it works properly. Carbon filter sets shouldn't take this long to flush. My carbon filter on my Samsung fridge takes like 30 seconds to flush after install.
customer_reviews.author: mojo1971

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use hard line tubes!
customer_reviews.text: This product had so much potential until they used cheapy threads! A standard 3/8 OD Tube compression fitting does NOT work with this product. Instead the threads were easily stripped on the first & third stage. Leaving you to have to use the skinny flex tubing which is a terrible idea if you have a higher water pressure! So $130 down the drain. You would think they would invest in proper fittings for the standard braided hoses for sinks instead of the unreliable quick connects. AVOID!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: So I had to replace the old under sink filter I had I tried another reverse osmosis filter and was not happy with it at all as they do waste a lot of water and the required tank is very bulky took it out got my money back and I finally settled on this filter (1 day in) and I have to say I’m very impressed with this filter I did a side by side comparison of filtered, unfiltered, and bottled water and the filtered one is actually cleaner, clearer, and better tasting than even the bottled one very impressed so far will revisit the review in one month or so and give update
customer_reviews.author: frank de armas

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be installed
customer_reviews.text: I’ll change my review after this thing can actually be installed. Arrived with everything except the disks that go between the faucet and the counter so it can’t be installed. Also it’s extremely annoying that I have to order a separate faucet if I don’t want a chrome faucet in my kitchen. Even on specs website you cannot pick what finish of faucet you want. Ordered a matte stainless faucet so hopefully that one comes with the appropriate materials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The TDS goes up to 689! Can you explain it?!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to have this filter when I saw lots of good reviews here. But the actual result is increasing my water TDS number to 689! Before installing it, the TDS was 370 around. I am so confused now and already stopped to use it. I felt I waste money this time. If anyone can help explain it, I would appreciate it very much. Updated on 10/21/2018: I changed the one star to three star since after flushed a while, the TDS number went down to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Franklin

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought sooner! I love this filter.
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research about which filter would suit my needs, compared the costs, and settled on the APEC WFS-1000 water filtration system. For whatever reason it took me a couple months to pull the trigger and actual purchase the unit. I really wish I would would have purchased the system sooner! I had postponed the purchase thinking that installation might be tricky, but boy was I wrong. This was easily installed in an hour (from opening box to filling a glass of water!). The kit includes a little roll of teflon tape, which was a nice perk. The water tastes great. No leaks! The water pressure is steady and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: roux

customer_reviews.title: Water taste great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this filtration system and was initially not happy with the taste of the water. The folks at APEC saw my negative review and sent me a different set of filters to used. They sense filters that removed fluoride and bacteria. After replacing the filters, there was a noticeable difference in the taste. It taste a lot better. I’m changing my review from 1 star to 5 stars. Thank you APEC team for your quick response and awesome customer care.
customer_reviews.author: khai_t

customer_reviews.title: A good choice
customer_reviews.text: After reading a million reviews of under sink water filtration systems, I settled on the APEC WFS-1000. I'm glad I did, because it's a good one. The installer said the fittings are of high quality, and after using it for about a month, I can vouch for the excellent taste of the water that comes through it. My only gripe is that it took a long time for the water to run clear of the sediment from inside the filter -- more like a week or two of use, not the paltry 5 minutes of letting the water run that is recommended by the manufacturer. However, that's finally over, and we're very happy with the system.
customer_reviews.author: Elana

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very easy to install. You don't even have to mount it, just put under the sink after you connect all the water line. The only thing I had problem with was that it took a while for the water to come out clean. It contained some particles from the filter or something. I ran it a long time, and still didn't improve much. I was thinking of returning it. But after a week, it seemed to clear up.
customer_reviews.author: tata

customer_reviews.title: Makes our Water taste like water and not chlorine
customer_reviews.text: Our city water isn't great. We have a whole house filter and that keeps out most of the iron and other sediment, but the taste is still off. We installed this and the taste is now great. We've got it installed in the basement utility room under the kitchen and it's teed off to supply both our faucet and our refrigerator so that our ice is good too, and we don't have to fight with being under the sink to change the filter. We liked it so much we gave one to my Mother In Law who also loves it.
customer_reviews.author: iceph03nix

customer_reviews.title: Serious water flow!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the GE two stage water filter that I broke recently. I was a little surprised at how big it was compared to the GE filter (about twice as big), but was very happy once I turned it on and saw the water flow. It pours at least 3x faster than the GE filter. The water tastes great, at least as good and probably better than the GE. I would highly recommend this one. Replacement was a breeze as I just cut the old inflow and outflow lines from the GE and stuck them in this one. Didn't bother mounting just let it stand on the bottom of the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: dandkim_md

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easy diy filtered water on tap
customer_reviews.text: I found this easy to install. Took about an hour start to finish. Came with everything needed, fits perfectly flush to sink, I installed using a pre existing soap dispenser hole. Water taste great and it's nice and convinent to have. Filters say replace every 12 months but there's very hard water here so we will check in 6 months. First faucet we recieved did leak out of the handle but customer service was quick to send us a replacement. So make sure you check for leaks after install.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Antonius

customer_reviews.title: Inline refrigerator/ice maker - No more chlorine taste - wish I could tighten the mounting screws with the system hung.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Just installed the system. I didn't use the faucet (wish there was an option to buy without) since I put it inline with my refrigerator/ice maker. Water comes out a little cloudy at first, but that's to be expected. After running through a few gallons to flush the system the chlorine taste is absolutely gone. I mounted mine in the utility room on the wall by the feed for the refrigerator. My only minor complaint is that you can't tighten the mounting screws so the water system sits at an angel.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Salerno

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1) Pystem seems high quality; heavy duty plastic. No signs of chinesium. 2) Water tastes great. I suspect savings over using jug-based filters like Brita. 3) Although the filters are large, the whole system fits in the cabinet under the sink. 4) You get a number of fittings that can work with existing cold water supplies. Cons: 1) It's a fairly easy filtering system to install. Just make sure that the nozzles that connect the rubber hoses are in all the way, otherwise you risk spilling water all over. I plan on getting flexible steel water supply hose.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, Very Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to install if you already have a hole in the countertop for it. I asked a plumber about installing it, and he said if you can't do it yourself, hire a handyman instead because a plumber would be overkill + expensive. We opted to do it ourselves and it went smoothly. Great instructions. Water is much clearer + no longer tastes like the way toilet water smells. Great value and you supposedly only need to switch the filters once a year! Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Replaced an RO system with this.
customer_reviews.text: This system was easy to install. The RO we had was overkill and too expensive. Out tap water isn't bad, but we prefer filtered water. The RO had waste water and required cartridge changes every 6 months on top of replacing the membrane. This will saving us about $80 per year over the RO with the difference in price for refills and this not having waste water. I think I'm going to convert my old RO using these cartridges for an easy swap out annually. Or just to have a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah G.

customer_reviews.title: What you need to filter your drinking water
customer_reviews.text: For the price and ease of install, I highly recommend this unit. While not an RO, this cleans our water very well, is super high flowing and the taste is ok. Most people get confused about the benefit of an RO system, but unless you have a specific need for distilled water or your water has very harmful chemicals in it, why have an RO system? You still need minerals in water and this system filters out the harmful and leaves enough that you still have the minerals you need.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hankin

customer_reviews.title: Good filters. Terrible dispenser
customer_reviews.text: The installation wasnt too bad. The filters and housing are good. The filters metal bracket could be a little thicker but my biggest gripe is with the dispenser. The top part is fine but the plastic base is SO FLIMSY it makes the whole thing wobble every time i use it. It bugged me so much i had to buy a replacement dispenser from another brand that has one solid piece of stainless steel. If you look closely this dispenser connects to a base below the handle and that is where the problem is. Terrible cheap design. I would not recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Tried & True

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied - but have issues!
customer_reviews.text: Good Flow & Taste! Box was opened/repacked. Multi breaks of the plastic top retention ring on one carbon filter - decided to keep, hoping that no broken pieces can pass thru 3rd stage filter. Was it a unit that was returned and either AMAZON (Goodyear AZ) returned to inventory, or the Manufacturer failed in quality control during packing- or both? After 4 days now - still has cloudy (small air bubbles). Decided to hang on cabinet wall, but the odd screw slot and its position behind filters make it difficult/impossible. (Check older Whirlpool small RO WHREE manifold for a better example of hanging such a unit.)
customer_reviews.author: BIRO

customer_reviews.title: Installed pretty easily if you just take your time and follow ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed pretty easily if you just take your time and follow the instructions. I just let the filters sit against the wall below the sink. They are heavy enough not to move around, and I can pull them out easily to change the filters........leave enough slack in the plastic tubing. The water tastes good, and the flow is much better than my older (Whirlpool) system. I also like that it is made in the U.S.A.
customer_reviews.author: gary w. thayer

customer_reviews.title: Best Filtering System
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in January 2020, and boy, am I glad we did! The water tastes just like bottled water. We haven't needed to replace the filter yet (takes 6 months or so). The installation was a bit exhausting but I wouldn't say its confusing. Just a lot of work, and maybe some leaky pipes. Overall, I HIGHLY recommend getting this instead of constantly buying water bottles and wasting plastic.
customer_reviews.author: ALT

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this filter
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to replace an old GE system after GE discontinued the model of filter needed. (There is a recommended substitute, but the flow rate is anemic with that alternative.) Installation is simple and generally well-documented. The parts all appear to be good quality. Filtered water tastes about the same as with the GE. Flow rate is WAY better than it ever was for the GE. The only issue you might have is that the space required is pretty large. The instructions linked in the Amazon description give the dimensions, so be sure to measure before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Stay away. Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This water filter decreased are parts per million by 20. Faucet water hose 167 ppm, filtered faucet water was 148 ppm. Not much of a difference. Tested both Waters for lead, Mercury, fluoride, chlorine, copper, iron. Both were negative. So basically this is $130 trinket to put on your sink. Extremely disappointed with this purchase I don't recommend this to anyone. I would have gotten a reverse osmosis but it wastes too much water.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Great water at a great price...explained in review
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much all of water we drink is through the sink filter. We aren’t big fans of bottled water b/c we hate dealing with the plastic, so we started filtering drinking water. We have used this system for a couple of years and the water always tastes great for our family of 5 for the full year. Filter changes are easier than our previous system, not to mention cheaper, much cheaper. If someone is looking for an undersink filter system, this would be my first recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Really great system, replaced a much more expensive unit
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a much more expensive UV/carbon filtration system that was 10 yrs old and had sprung a leak. This entire system cost less than the replacement filter cartridge for our old one. I had to buy a couple of John Guest fittings for install, but otherwise it was super easy. We are really pleased with the quality and taste of the filtered water, better than we had before, and am thrilled with the lowered maintenance cost, quality and overall value of this system from APEC. Buy this one with confidence, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: M S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this filter will do the job for a year. There are two carbon filters and one sediment filter which does not look like it can filter out chemical in the water or is that the job of the carbon filter? But it looks strong and easy to install , it came with a adapter to fit onto the water faucet valve . Please follow the instructions and pay attention to where you need to put the o-ring and Teflon tape that was included in the perchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Intara

customer_reviews.title: Great Value! Very pleased with the quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews but this product is fantastic. I researched many water filter before finally choosing Apec WFS 1000. In my opinion this is the best bang for your buck when it comes to affordable 3 stage filters. The water tastes great. My wife and I compared it to the bottled water we used to purchase and we couldn't believe how much better our filtered water tastes. The bottled water tastes almost chemical like compred to our new apec system. I'm super happy that we bought this brand, highly reccommend.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Dusty

customer_reviews.title: More of a 2 stage concept.
customer_reviews.text: It is more like a 2 stage since stage filter 2 and 3 are the same dang filter. Looking to switch stage 3 filter out with filter that is about 1 micron. Easy install
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Buck 71

customer_reviews.title: Packaging and Instructions Made Installation Easy
customer_reviews.text: Only just got it installed today. Assembly took a few minutes using the easy-to-follow instructions. Bought adapter fittings at Lowe's since I was replacing an existing system that used a different diameter for both lines. No problem as the adapters made the whole thing even easier! Used my existing high-end faucet that matches my kitchen, so that was slick. Impressed with the design/engineering and packaging of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain West Bob

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We bought this unit to replace our filtered water bottle service. Installation was very easy and the provided instructions were clear and overall very intuitive. The water tastes clean and seems to have eliminated the slight chlorine-like smell and taste we get from our municipal water supply. There is a marginal diminished flow caused by the filtration, but it fills bottles twice as fast as our bottled water unit or a Brita Filter-As-You-Pour model. The only real "downside" is the water temperature is as it comes into the house, which in some climates can be particularly warm. Still, ideal for tea and coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Water!
customer_reviews.text: This filter produces great tasting water! I g hv ave has it installed for about 5 months and I am really happy with it. The package comes with everything that you need to hook it up to your existing sink. I didn’t end up using the valve hardware as I opted to install a dual shutoff so I could shut it off separately from the main kitchen faucet. Again, I noticed a huge improvement in the taste of my water after installing this filter!!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and water quality is not bad at all.
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by how easy it was to install. The only disappointment is the quality of the faucet that is included with this system. If you have a fairly new kitchen with nice appliances, I would hesitate to install the provided faucet which looks like it came out of cereal box. Otherwise, I am very happy with the water quality and taste.
customer_reviews.author: YD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and economical!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy. Had a plumber install this for $100 and was worth it. Water tasted much better and you can tell the chlorine taste is gone! Yes there are better filtration devices but reverse osmosis is not for us. Too little output and don’t need it where we live because the water isn’t too bad. This is what we needed instead of a reverse osmosis system. Also takes very little space once mounted on inside cabinet wall under the sink.
customer_reviews.author: MTFBWY

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a nice filter system
customer_reviews.text: Fitters where easy to install, and replacement filters are reasonable price. I am using this filter system for my plumb in Espresso machine, probably more then I needed but I will know for sure in a year from now when I take the head apart to see how clean it is. At that time i will come back with a update.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Bock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Water Filter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 2-stage GE filter system that was installed under our kitchen sink when the house was built almost 20 years ago. This is very similar to that system except this has 2 carbon filters instead of 1 in the GE. Product was packaged very well and instructions were easy to follow. I had to make a trip to the orange big box store to pick up some 3/8" to 1/4" quick connect adapters as the lines in the old GE were 3/8 and these are 1/4. Other than that installation was a breeze. Can't speak to the quality of the included faucet as I already had another fairly new faucet. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Don D

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Came with a broken piece, which I didn’t discover until I had already installed most of it under my sink. So 2 hours in and I had to take everything back apart. Contacted the manufacturer and they said they would said a replacement to the broken piece and it would be here in 2 days. A week has passed now and still no replacement piece, so I’m returning it and buying from another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Pretzel

customer_reviews.title: Water taste great
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this filter in, so I can't say how easy it was but the clean flavor taste great. I give this filtered water to my pets, plants and everything except washing dishes. My daughter, who worked for a water purifying company, loves it better than the ones she sold. Haven't had to replace filters yet.... hoping the prices will also be good.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Manor

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: We moved to a new house and our well water gets really rusty after a heavy rain. I finally got sick of buying bottled water, did some research and decided on this filtration system. We replaced the third stage filter with a 1 micron filter. We just had our first heavy rain since installing it and you can see the amazing difference, and the water tastes great. Very satisfied with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Agape

customer_reviews.title: Have 50 year old plumbing...
customer_reviews.text: After getting this filter system installed, the water almost feels like it's gone through a water softener and it taste great even with the 50 year old pipes! I use to filter my water with some common pitcher filters and use it for myself and my pets. After a few days, my pet water dispenser had green algae growth starting. NOT with this filter system. The water stays clear. I'd recommend this to anyone with old pipes or less than great tasting water. D.R.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Rivers

customer_reviews.title: tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I got a great deal on WFS-1000 system for my rv and love it , I've already gone through my first set of filters they lasted as stated (6-8 months) my wife is a water snob and this filter system matched with the right set of filters i got her to switch from her certain bottled water to this . I completely recommend this system
customer_reviews.author: The imsjimkim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install if you already have plastic push connectors on your sink.
customer_reviews.text: First unit leaked at factory joint. Check for leaks as first step. Second unit installed in <30 minutes. I did not bolt the unit to the wall. It doesn't need it. Water flavor tastes just like our bottle water service. We use it for making coffee taste better at work.
customer_reviews.author: Blowfish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: When you have easy installation and no leaks or drips in the plumbing world, you know you have a good product. We are more than pleased after using this for over a month. I didn't mount the filters to the side of the cabinet because I didn't see the need to. They sit just fine on the bottom. I would highly recommend this product without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Cravin Morfish

customer_reviews.title: Good looking system
customer_reviews.text: Good looking system. Wound up having a plumber install it as the fittings in our condo were of shoddy original build so rather than clean up a major mess, I paid for quality connections and new hookups at the main. The filter rack is sturdy and well made, the water has to be run initially or it will be cloudy but the taste is great and now I dont pay for monthly water delivery I then have to lug up stairs. good value
customer_reviews.author: John g

customer_reviews.title: water still taste like tap water
customer_reviews.text: with this filter, water still taste like tap water. painfully waited for one week to see if quality may improve giving it some time to sit in. No, it does not.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy water with this filter system.
customer_reviews.text: This filter was pretty easy to install. Had to use a 1/2 drill bit to drill a hole into my sink for installation. It looks nice but the water is cloudy and even after I let it run for 10 minutes it is still cloudy. I let the water sit thinking they might be air bubbles (some of them were) there are other particles still floating after I let the water sit in a glass for 10 minutes. Was hoping to see clear water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good water system which makes water taste good
customer_reviews.text: I seldomly put 5 stars. But this one works so great that you do not need reverse osmosis. Install took me a while go figure out the pipping nipples since this is the first time I did it. Instructions might need to be colored in the future to help better. Pressure was good even splitting into the fridge water as well. Will definitely buy APEC water system in the future again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Clean tasting water
customer_reviews.text: This filter system seems well reviewed so we decided to try it. It was an easy install, with good instructions, and the water from it tastes much better than straight from the tap. I wish the 3rd filter would state the micron rating, such for knowledge sake. I also installed it with a different faucet, the hot/cold one that came with a hot water dispenser we bought.
customer_reviews.author: Vidivici

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our APEC filter system. I can't comment on ease of installation because we used Amazon services and had someone install it. But the water tastes great. Taste was the primary reason we installed a filter and we are completely satisfied. These filters also do not need to be replaced as often as some other systems, which is another reason we chose it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not RO, but still very good.
customer_reviews.text: Straightforward enough to install and service (replace filters). Definitely makes the water a lot better, though taste is not quite as good compared to RO system, but it doesn't waste water unlike most RO systems, and also allows water throughput all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: The water taste is excellent and the pressure is high enough to use for ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why I waited so long to do this. The water taste is excellent and the pressure is high enough to use for cooking, drinking and feed my refrigerator water chiller and ice cube maker. Installation could not be easier. Anyone can do it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Magrogan

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting filters! Family of 4 plus 4 animals
customer_reviews.text: Bought spring 2017. For a family of four. We did not replace the filters for a year and a half and they seemed to work well, taste was not compromised before replacing the filters. I can taste the difference between this water and tap water easily! We are heavy water drinkers and use the water for cooking and our four animals as well. product_meta.title: APEC WFS-1000 Super Capacity Premium Quality 3 Stage Under-Sink Water Filter System
product_meta.description:
The APEC 3 stage water filtration system delivers clean filtered water at an affordable price. This complete 3-stage water filter system is made from high Caliber components to offer long-lasting, reliable performance. The three premium quality filters lasts over 12 months for fewer filter change outs and high performance. Designed and assemble in the USA, the system provides a continuous on demand supply of quality filtered water directly to your tap.

>1st stage: high-grade 10 inch high-capacity polypropylene sediment filter -removes dust, particles, and rust. 100% pure polypropylene depth filter with exceptional dirt-holding capacity translates to longer life and fewer change-outs than existing string-wound or resin-bonded filters.

>2nd stage: premium extruded carbon block 10 inch -gets rid of unpleasant chlorine, tastes, odors, cloudiness and colors. Also removes vocs and other common chemicals from the water.

3rd stage: premium extruded carbon block 10 inch - further removes chlorine, tastes, odors, and other common chemicals from the water to provide great filtered water.

Do not connect this unit to hot water source

Install the unit in a sheltered environment, avoid exposure to hot and cold weather or under direct sun light

Fitting size (in.) - 0.25
feature_bullets: High quality, designed, engineered and assembled in the USA; System built with US MADE super capacity filters for long lasting dependable filtration
Guaranteed to remove chemicals (i.e. chlorine), taste and odors. NOT designed for TDS removal
Premium long-lasting filters used to treat tap water, well water. Provide unlimited refreshing water
1 year satisfaction guarantee, with lifetime support by certified WQA water specialist based in CA
System comes with 100% Lead-Free chrome faucet, plus FDA certified JG food grade tubing to provide safe, odorless, chlorine-free clean water
